headline: DexCom Stelo AI Upgrade Aims To Deepen Consumer Metabolic Health Engagement
summary: DexCom (NasdaqGS:DXCM) announced new AI-enabled features for its Stelo glucose monitoring system. The update adds a comprehensive nutrition database, expanded meal tracking, and personalized behavioral insights. The enhancements are designed to support users focused on metabolic health and broader wellness goals. DexCom, best known for continuous glucose monitoring in diabetes care, is extending its reach further into consumer health with Stelo. By tying real time glucose data to structured...
